document.full_text: a missouri man who lured children to his home by hosting ice cream-eating contests was found guilty on wednesday of drugging and sexually molesting more than a dozen young girls -- and then posting videos of the assaults on the internet.
document.title: missouri man guilty of lacing ice cream, molesting girls
lines_and_colors: a missouri man who lured children to his home by hosting ice cream-eating contests was found guilty on wednesday of drugging and sexually molesting more than a dozen young girls -- and then posting videos of the assaults on the internet.
